scripts.testNodeDev: npm run lint && cross-env TEST_ENV=dev node_modules/mocha-webpack/bin/mocha-webpack --webpack-config config/webpack.config.node.js --timeout 60000 --colors "test/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.testNodeStg: npm run lint && cross-env TEST_ENV=stg node_modules/mocha-webpack/bin/mocha-webpack --webpack-config config/webpack.config.node.js --timeout 60000 --colors "test/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.testNodeSandbox: npm run lint && cross-env TEST_ENV=sandbox node_modules/mocha-webpack/bin/mocha-webpack --webpack-config config/webpack.config.node.js --timeout 60000 --colors "test/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.testNodePrd: npm run lint && cross-env TEST_ENV=prd node_modules/mocha-webpack/bin/mocha-webpack --webpack-config config/webpack.config.node.js --timeout 60000 --colors "test/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.bambooDev: npm run lint && cross-env TEST_ENV=dev node_modules/mocha-webpack/bin/mocha-webpack --webpack-config config/webpack.config.node.js --timeout 60000 --colors -R mocha-bamboo-reporter  "test/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.bambooStg: npm run lint && cross-env TEST_ENV=stg node_modules/mocha-webpack/bin/mocha-webpack --webpack-config config/webpack.config.node.js --timeout 60000 --colors -R mocha-bamboo-reporter  "test/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.bambooSandbox: npm run lint && cross-env TEST_ENV=sandbox node_modules/mocha-webpack/bin/mocha-webpack --webpack-config config/webpack.config.node.js --timeout 60000 --colors -R mocha-bamboo-reporter  "test/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.bambooPrd: npm run lint && cross-env TEST_ENV=prd node_modules/mocha-webpack/bin/mocha-webpack --webpack-config config/webpack.config.node.js --timeout 60000 --colors -R mocha-bamboo-reporter  "test/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
